input.sentences: the lady and her husband are having a picnic at the park
these are their kids that seem to be enjoying themselves
this is their youngest child playing with his mom
this is their second oldest daughter who lying on a blanket listening to music
at dark we enjoyed beautiful fire works .
output.sentences: Today at the park I took pictures of a picnic with a lady and her family.
The kids seemed to be really enjoying themselves.
The kids played so much with each other and the mom played with the child.
One little girl was taking a time to listen to some music.
To end this perfect day, we watched fireworks in the dark.
